Create the DirtyPng module state.

Returns
DirtyPngStateT * - pointer to new ref, or NULL if error
Version
02/07/2007 (cadam)

References DirtyMemAlloc(), DirtyMemGroupQuery(), DIRTYPNG_MEMID, DirtyPngStateT::iMemGroup, NetPrintf, and DirtyPngStateT::pMemGroupUserData.

Referenced by DirtyGraphCreate().

DIRTYCODE_API int32_t DirtyPngDecodeImage ( DirtyPngStateT *  pState,
DirtyPngHdrT *  pPngHdr,
uint8_t *  pImageData,
int32_t  iBufWidth,
int32_t  iBufHeight 
)

Decode a PNG image into an 8bit paletteized bitmap.

Parameters
*pState- pointer to the module state
*pPngHdr- pointer to header describing png to decode
*pImageData- [out] pointer to buffer to write decoded image data to
iBufWidth- width of output buffer
iBufHeight- height of output buffer
Returns
int32_t - positive=number of bytes decoded, negative=error
Version
05/01/2007 (cadam)

References DirtyMemAlloc(), DirtyMemFree(), DIRTYPNG_ERR_ALLOCFAIL, DIRTYPNG_ERR_NONE, DIRTYPNG_MEMID, FALSE, DirtyPngHdrT::iBitDepth, DirtyPngStateT::iMemGroup, NetPrintf, DirtyPngStateT::pCurrScanline, DirtyPngStateT::pImageBuf, DirtyPngStateT::pMemGroupUserData, DirtyPngStateT::pPrevScanline, DirtyPngStateT::pScanlines, TRUE, DirtyPngStateT::uBType, DirtyPngStateT::uBufHeight, DirtyPngStateT::uBufWidth, DirtyPngStateT::uPixelWidth, DirtyPngStateT::uScanlineWidth, and DirtyPngHdrT::uWidth.

Referenced by DirtyGraphDecodeImage().

DirtyPngHdrT *  pPngHdr,

const uint8_t *  pPngEnd 
)

Parse PNG header.

Parameters

*pPngHdr- [out] pointer to PNG header to fill in
*pPngData- pointer to PNG data
*pPngEnd- pointer past the end of PNG data
